message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that I believe holds significant value, and I'm confident it can benefit your endeavors.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm willing to offer it to you for a price that reflects its potential. Would you be interested in discussing a price of $1500000?
